item.title: Special Event Permits
item.author: covanalytics@covingtonky.gov?subject=CovData%20Short%20Idea
item.description: Any event (i.e.Â festival, concert, run/walk, art show, etc.) that uses, or will likely have a large impact on public or City-owned property, such as streets or parks, requires a Special Event Permit Application. This is information that the City of Covington requires to ensure that everything goes smoothly and safely with the event. Some events, naturally, last longer than others. What kind of world would this be if we only have one day to enjoy the Rockin Taco Fest?
